summary: Relating to the Police Department; authorizing execution of an agreement with the Office of Community Oriented Policing Services, United States Department of Justice for financial assistance for the community and the Police Department to facilitate problem-solving partnerships to address a persistent crime or disorder problem; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1997 Budget of the Police Department; ratifying and confirming prior acts and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
